name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: Steam disallowed cross-regional gifting, because they alter their prices according to the standard-of-liv ing values of said regions. This is to keep people in nations like the US from abusing stores like Russia where games are priced much much cheaper. (Yes, it's disallowed even if the game is purchased in a pricier store and wanting to be gifted to a cheaper region)
